page.title: 05The population, Great Orton
page.content: Today 170 people live in the village. The main occupation is agriculture although the soil tends to be heavy,cold & wet. The ground is a gravelly, clay type. There are 3 main farms, although some retired farmers have land which they let out for grass or animal grazing. Crops grown mainly in the area are barley, oats, hay, silage & vegetables. Modern machinery & equipment have made the farmers' work a little easier.Hereford,Rimousin Charolais and Fresian cattle are the main breeds of this district. One farmer has a flock of sheep kept for lambing. Poultry are also part of each farm.Other occupations are:building, haulage,doctors,council, education, printing,shops,factories,offices,oil, sales & Milk Marketing.Most workers travel daily to Carlisle or Wigton. The haulage firm is based in Gt Orton.
